Description: The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission issued an Order against Cooperatieve Centrale Raiffeisen-Boerenleenbank B.A. (Rabobank) settling charges of false reporting and attempted manipulation of the London Interbank Offered Rate (LIBOR) and the Euro Interbank Offered Rate (Euribor).

Cooperatieve Centrale Raiffeisen-Boerenleenbank B.A. (Rabobank) entered into an agreement with the Department of Justice to pay a $325 million penalty to resolve violations arising from Rabobank's submissions for the London InterBank Offered Rate (LIBOR) and the Euro Interbank Offered Rate (Euribor).

Agency: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency

Description: Rabobank National Association, a subsidiary of the Netherlands-based Cooperatieve Rabobank U.A., pleaded guilty to a felony conspiracy charge for impairing, impeding and obstructing its primary regulator, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, by concealing deficiencies in its anti-money laundering program.

Agency: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency

Description: Rabobank's California subsidiary was sentenced to pay a $500,000 criminal fine in addition to a previous agreement to forefeit $368 million in connection with its guilty plea relating to charges that it obstructed an Office of the Comptroller of the Currency examination of deficiencies in the bank's anti-money laundering program.

Company: De Lage Landen Financial Services, Inc.
Description: De Lage Landen agreed to write off $872,000 in small business debt to settle multistate litigation relating to a consumer fraud perpetrated by NorVergence, Inc., a bankrupt New Jersey-based telecommunications company.
Info Source: Attorney General Madigan Settles Norvergence Claims with Fifth Leasing on Behalf of Illinois Small Businesses, US States News, August 18, 2005 (via Nexis).

Description: The New York Attorney General announced settlements with five financial institutions in connection with a widespread telecommunications fraud involving NorVergence, Inc., a bankrupt New Jersey-based telephone equipment and service company.
